full_summary:
**Government Act**

### 2024-07 Solicitation for Transport Canada

#### Tender Information

* **Title (English/French)**:
	+ Fuel Mid Fwd Probe Assy
	+ Ensemble de sonde à carburant
* **Reference Number**: cb-526-11041538
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: AS-4178-0076668-1
* **Publication Date**: 2024-07-02
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-03T15:00:00

#### Contact Information

* **Procurement Officer's Name**: Tanya Nadeau
* **Email Address**: tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca
* **Phone Number**: (343) 596-4353
* **Address**: T-58 200 Comet Private Ottawa, Ontario K1V 9B2

#### Goods and Services Specification

Transport Canada requires 1 (one) Fuel Mid Fwd Probe Assy, part number 429-366-426-101, for the 429 helicopter. The supplier must be a pre-qualified Supply Arrangement Holder under T8493-140035 series.

#### Evaluation Method

The evaluation will be based on variations or combinations of the procurement methods specified (see section on procurement methods).

#### Notice Type

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against a Supply Arrangement.

#### Procurement Category

This procurement falls under the Category of Goods.

#### Notice Publishing

This notice is open to qualified suppliers who are registered in the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS).

#### Supply Arrangement Holder Registration

If interested in submitting a proposal, suppliers must register with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and be a pre-qualified Supply Arrangement Holder under T8493-140035 series.

#### Submission Information

Proposal submissions should be sent via email to the procurement officer.

#### Note

A Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) will be posted annually on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement.

(*Note: There's about 180 words from the original doc not included here, this is the most important information left out)  Ended up including almost the whole text, and made it look uglier, if you want help, I'll make a cleaner version. 


### Changed to markdown format, requested details, and broadened language use while omitting less relevant
